info.title: Massachusetts Legislature Public API
info.description: An API for use in obtaining all publicly available information from the Massachusetts Legislature.

get.summary: Returns a list of amendments by Document Number for the current General Court.
Returns a list of amendments by Document Number and General Court.
Returns a list of amendments by Document Number and General Court and Branch.
Returns a specific Amendment by General Court And Document Number And Branch and Amendment Number
Returns a list of amendments by Document Number and General Court And Branch And Category.
Returns all active Committees in the current General Court
Returns a Committee by the Committee Code

parameters.name: committeeCode
parameters.description: The Committee Code to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all active Committees by the General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a Committee by the Committee Code and General Court

parameters.name: committeeCode
parameters.description: The Committee Code to filter by.

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all Committee Codes that contain Committee Votes.
Returns all Committee Votes for by Committee Code and Document Number in the current General Court.
Returns all Committees Votes by Committee Code, Document Number, and General Court.
Returns a document's history by the Bill or Docket Number

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The Bill or Docket Number to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a document's history by the Bill or Docket Number and General Court

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The Bill or Docket Number to filter by.

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a list of documents based on the city for the current general court
Returns all of documents publicly available in the current General Court
Returns a document by the Bill or Docket Number

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The Bill or Docket Number to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a list of similar documents to the given document

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The document number to filter by

get.summary: Returns a list of available cities to search for local bills in the current General Court.
Returns a list of documents based on the city and the general court number
Returns all of documents publicly available by the General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a document by the Bill or Docket Number and General Court

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The Bill or Docket Number to filter by.

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a list of similar documents to the given document

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: The document number to filter by

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The general court number to filter by

get.summary: Returns a list of available cities to search for local bills by General Court.
This call is not supported. You must specify what context you are trying to get the available General Courts for.
This call is not supported. Further details for each General Court provided are not available

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: Number of the General Court to be returned.

get.summary: Returns a list of all General Courts with Committees available
Returns a list of all General Courts with Documents available
Returns a list of all General Courts with Legislators available
Returns a list of all General Courts with Sessions available
Returns all of the General Law Chapters currently available.
Returns the details for a specific Chapter

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The chapter code to filter by

get.summary: Returns all of the chapters for a specific Part

parameters.name: partCode
parameters.description: The Part code to filter by

get.summary: Returns all of the General Laws Parts currently available
Returns the details for a specific Part

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The Part code to filter by

get.summary: Returns all of the General Law Sections contained in a specific chapter

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter to filter by

get.summary: Returns the details of a specific section based on the chapter and section

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: The chapter code to filter by

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: The section code to filter by

get.summary: Returns all hearings publicly available
Returns a hearing by the Hearing ID

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The Hearing ID to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all publicly available House Journals for the specified General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by

get.summary: Returns all publicly available House Journals for the current General Court
Returns a House Journal by General Court, Session Date, and Whether it is a joint session or not.  The Date must be provided in the format: yyyyMMddHHmmss

parameters.name: sessionDate
parameters.description: The Session Date to filter by

parameters.name: isJoint
parameters.description: Whether it was a Joint Session

get.summary: Returns the Legislative Leadership by Branch for the current General Court.
Returns the Legislative Leadership by Branch and General Court.
Returns all the legislative members by General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a legislative member by the General Court number and the member code

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

parameters.name: memberCode
parameters.description: The member code to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all active legislative members in the current General Court
Returns a legislative member by the member code for the current General Court

parameters.name: memberCode
parameters.description: The member code to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all publicly available Reports by Branch.
Returns all publicly available Reports for the current General Court.
Returns the Roll Calls by Document Number for the current General Court.
Returns a Roll Call by General Court, Branch, and Roll Call Number
Returns the Roll Calls by Document Number and General Court Number.
Returns all publicly available Senate Journals for specified General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by

get.summary: Returns all publicly available Senate Journals for the current General Court
Returns a Senate Journal by the Session Date. The Date must be in the format yyyyMMddHHmmss.

parameters.name: sessionDate
parameters.description: The session date of the journal

parameters.name: isJoint
parameters.description: Whether it was a Joint Session

get.summary: Returns all of the Session Laws for the current year
Returns all the Session Laws for the specified year

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year of the session to filter by.

get.summary: Returns a Session Law based on the Session year and chapter number

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year of the Session to filter by.

parameters.name: chapterNumber
parameters.description: The chapter number of the Session Law

get.summary: Returns a list of all the available years in which Session Laws exist
Returns all Sessions by the General Court

parameters.name: generalCourtNumber
parameters.description: The General Court to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all Sessions in the current General Court
Returns a Session by the Session ID

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The Session ID to filter by.

get.summary: Returns all publicly available Special Events
Returns a Special Event by Special Event ID

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The Special Event ID to filter by.

AgendaItem.description: Data Model for event agenda items returned in single API calls

startTime.description: Start time of the agenda item

endTime.description: End time of the agenda item

documentsInAgenda.description: List of all Documents being discussed in this agenda item

amendmentNumber.description: The Amendment number of the Amendment.

parentBillNumber.description: The Bill Number that the Amendment is for.

bill.description: The link to the Amendment Document page if it exists.

rollCall.description: The Roll Call taken of the Amendment.

redraftCount.description: The Redraft count of the Amendment.

isFurther.description: Whether the amendment is a Further Amendment.

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Amendment.

AmendmentSummary.description: The data model for a limited Amendment

amendmentNumber.description: The Amendment Number of the Amendment.

parentBillNumber.description: The Bill Number of the Bill that is being Amended.

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Bill being Amended.

details.description: A link to the detailed model of an Amendment.

Attachment.description: The data model for Attachments returned with Bill Documents

downloadUrl.description: The download link of the Attachment

BillSponsorSummary.description: Data Model for Bill Sponsors returned in batch API calls

type.description:
Type of the Bill Sponsor
1 = Legislative Member, 2 = Committee, 3 = Public Request, 4 = Special Request

details.description:
Link for the API to get the details for this entry
Only Committees and Legislative Members will have further details that can be obtained in this way

Committee.description: Data Model for Committees returned in single API calls

documentsBeforeCommittee.description: List of all Documents currently before this committee

reportedOutDocuments.description: List of all Documents Reported Out from this committee

hearings.description: List of all Documents Reported Out from this committee

CommitteeRecommendation.description: The data model for Commitee Recommendations returned in Bill Documents.

action.description: The action recommended by the Committee.

fiscalAmounts.description: The Fiscal Amounts decided by the Committee.

votes.description: A list of votes by the Committee.

CommitteeSummary.description: Data Model for Committees returned in batch API calls

details.description: Link for the API to get the details for this Committee

question.description: The Question Text of the Committee Vote

bill.description: The Bill the Vote is on.

date.description: The time the vote was taken.

CommitteeVoteRecord.description: The data model for recorded Committee Votes

favorable.description: A list of members who voted Favorable.

adverse.description: A list of members who voted Adverse.

reserveRight.description: A list of members who voted ReserveRight.

noVoteRecorded.description: A list of members who have No Vote Recorded.

Document.description: Data Model for documents returned in single API calls

primarySponsor.description: The primary sponsor of this Document.

cosponsors.description: List of all Legislators copsonsoring this Document.

billHistory.description: Link to the Bill History for this Document.

legislationTypeName.description: Display name for the legislation type of this Document.

pinslip.description: The Pinslip text of the Document.

emergencyPreamble.description: The Emergency Preamble of the Document.

rollCalls.description: A list of Roll Calls made on this bill.

attachments.description: A list of links to download Document Attachments.

committeeRecommendations.description: A list of Committee Recommendations made on the bill.

amendments.description: A list of Amendments to the bill.

DocumentHistoryAction.description: Data Model for actions taken in the Document's History

branch.description: Branch that took action on the Document

action.description: Details of the action taken on the document

DocumentSummary.description: Data Model for documents returned in batch API calls

primarySponsor.description: The primary sponsor of this Document

details.description: Link for the API to get the details for this entry

isDocketBookOnly.description: Details are not available on dockets which are only visible on the Clerk's Docket Book

DtoBase.description: Interface for all Models to share

Event.description: Data Model for events returned in single API calls

eventId.description: ID of the Special Event, Hearing, or Session

name.description: Name of the event. In the case of hearings, the name is the name of the hosting Committee or Commission

FiscalAmount.description: Data Model for fiscal amounts of a committee recommendation

GeneralCourt.description: Data model for General Courts returned in API calls

firstYear.description: The first year of the General Court

secondYear.description: The second year of the General Court (if applicable)

GeneralLawChapter.description: Data Model for Chapters returned in single API calls

code.description: The Code of the General Law Chapter

name.description: The Name of the General Law Chapter

isRepealed.description: If the Chapter is repealed or not

strickenText.description: The stricken text if the chapter is repealed

part.description: A link to the Part that the contains the chapter

sections.description: A list of the sections contained by the chapter

GeneralLawChapterSummary.description: Data Model for Chapters returned in batch API calls

code.description: The Code of the General Law Chapter

details.description: Link to the API call for the detailed information of this Chapter

GeneralLawPart.description: Data Model for Parts returned in single API calls

code.description: The Code of the General Law Part

name.description: The Name of the General Law Part

firstChapter.description: The First Chapter in the General Law Part

lastChapter.description: The Last Chapter in the General Law Part

chapters.description: A list of links to the Chapters contained within the General Law Part

GeneralLawPartSummary.description: Data Model for Parts returned in batch API calls

code.description: The Code of the General Law Part

details.description: A link to the detailed information about this General Law Part

GeneralLawSection.description: Data Model for Sections returned in single API calls

code.description: The code of the General Law Section

name.description: The name of the General Law Section

isRepealed.description: If the General Law Section has been repealed

text.description: The text of the General Law Section

chapter.description: A link to the Chapter that the section is under

part.description: A link to the Part that the section is under

GeneralLawSectionSummary.description: Data Model for Sections returned in batch API calls

code.description: The code of the General Law Section

chapterCode.description: The code of the chapter of the General Law Section

details.description: A link to the detailed information about this General Law Section

Hearing.description: Data Model for hearings returned in single API calls

hearingHost.description: Committee or Commission hosting the hearing

hearingAgendas.description: List of all topics being discussed in this hearing

rescheduledHearing.description: If this hearing was rescheduled, this is the previous schedule that has been replaced

HearingRescheduled.description: Data Model for the past schedule associated with a rescheduled hearing

startTime.description: Former start time of the hearing

HearingSummary.description: Data Model for hearings returned in batch API calls

details.description: Link to the API call for the detailed information of this hearing

HouseJournal.description: Data Model for House Journals returned in single API calls

journalSessionDate.description: The Journal Number of the Journal

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Journal

isJoint.description: Whether the journal is from a joint session

downloadUrl.description: A link to the PDF of the Journal

sessionDate.description: The date the Session Ended, used in transformations

rollCallRange.description: The Range of the Roll Calls

JournalSummary.description: The Data Model for Journals returned in Batch Queries

journalSessionDate.description: The Numeric Date of the Session

isJoint.description: Whether the journal is from a joint session

details.description: A link to the detailed information about this Senate Journal

member.description: A link to the details of the Legislative Member

position.description: The Leadership position of the member

LegislativeMember.description: Data Model for Legislative Member returned in single API calls

generalCourtNumber.description: General Court for this legislative member

leadershipPosition.description: Leadership position of the legislative member

branch.description: Branch that the legislative member works in

memberCode.description: Member code of the legislative member

emailAddress.description: Email address of the legislative member

roomNumber.description: The room number of the legislative member

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the legislative member

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the legislative member

sponsoredBills.description: A list of bills that are sponsored by the legislative member

coSponsoredBills.description: A list of bills that are co-sponsored by the legislative member

committees.description: A list of Committees the legislative member is of

LegislativeMemberSummary.description: Data Model for Legislative Members returned in batch API calls

generalCourtNumber.description: General Court for this legislative member

memberCode.description: Member code of the legislative member

details.description: Link for the API to get the details for this entry

Report.description: The Data Model for Reports return in API Queries

date.description: The date the report was released.

submittedBy.description: Who the report was submitted by.

downloadUrl.description: The Url to download the report.

RollCall.description: Data Model for RollCalls returned in API calls

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Roll Call

branch.description: The Branch of the Roll Call

questionMotion.description: The Question Motion Text of the Roll Call

rollCallNumber.description: The Roll Call Number of the Roll Call

yeas.description: A list of legislative members who voted Yea

nays.description: A list of legislative members who voted Nay

absent.description: A list of legislative members who were Absent

downloadUrl.description: A link to download a PDF of the Roll Call

RollCallSummary.description: The Data Model for a limited Roll Call used in Batch Queries

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Roll Call

branch.description: The Branch of the Roll Call

details.description: Link for the API to get the details for this entry

SenateJournal.description: Data Model for Senate Journals returned in single API calls. This is here to hide the fact that the journals inherit from the same base class

journalSessionDate.description: The Journal Number of the Journal

generalCourtNumber.description: The General Court Number of the Journal

isJoint.description: Whether the journal is from a joint session

downloadUrl.description: A link to the PDF of the Journal

sessionDate.description: The date the Session Ended, used in transformations

Session.description: Data Model for sessions returned in single API calls

locationName.description: Name of the location for this Session

SessionLaw.description: Data Model for Session Laws returned in API calls

year.description: The year the Session Law is enacted for

chapterNumber.description: The chapter number of the Session Law

type.description: The type of the Session Law

approvalType.description: The approval type of the Session Law

title.description: The title of the Session Law

status.description: The status of the Session Law

approvedDate.description: The approval date of the Session Law

chapterText.description: The text of the Session Law

originBill.description: The limited bill, used to create a link to the detailed bill

SpecialEvent.description: Data Model for Special Events returned in single API calls

SponsorTypeEnum.description:
Type of the person or collective sponsoring the Document
1 = Legislative Member, 2 = Committee, 3 = Public Request, 4 = Special Request
